articles.title: Biden's electric vehicle sales goal won't be too hard to reach by 2030 - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden announced an agreement Thursday that aims to push the US auto industry to sell more electric vehicles. The goals include a "shared aspiration" that 40% to 50% of vehicles sold in the US will be electric, plug-in hybrids or hydrogen-powered.
